author: steemitboard
body:
Congratulations @dunsky! You have completed the following achievement on the Steem blockchain and have been rewarded with new badge(s) :
https://steemitimages.com/60x70/http://steemitboard.com/@dunsky/votes.png?201812101133You made more than 6000 upvotes. Your next target is to reach 7000 upvotes.
https://steemitimages.com/60x70/http://steemitboard.com/@dunsky/posts.png?201812101316You published more than 250 posts. Your next target is to reach 300 posts.
_[Click here to view your Board of Honor](https://steemitboard.com/@dunsky)_ _If you no longer want to receive notifications, reply to this comment with the word_ `STOP` To support your work, I also upvoted your post! > Support [SteemitBoard's project](https://steemit.com/@steemitboard)! **[Vote for its witness](https://v2.steemconnect.com/sign/account-witness-vote?witness=steemitboard&approve=1)** and **get one more award**!
